DOC.criteria: The subject sign date informed consent form ( ICF ) The subject female , generally healthy , postmenarcheal , nulliparous parous , require contraception , 18 year age Screening visit The subject regular menstrual cycle without hormonal contraceptive use ( regular interval 2135 day ) In opinion investigator , subject general uterine condition suitable insertion levonorgestrel intrauterine contraceptive system ( LCS12 ) ( uterine sound depth 610 cm ) Has clinically normal safety laboratory result The subject normal clinically insignificant cervical smear ( i.e . one require follow accord Bethesda comparable system ) The subject willing able attend schedule study visit comply study procedure Known suspected pregnancy lactate Vaginal delivery , cesarean delivery , abortion le 6 week Visit 1 History ectopic pregnancy Infected abortion postpartum endometritis le 3 month Visit 1 Abnormal uterine bleed unknown origin Any low genital tract infection ( successfully treat ) Acute history recurrent pelvic inflammatory disease Congenital acquire uterine anomaly
